page.title: 14CHILDREN`S GAMES IN 1985
page.content: Children at Stoke Ash School have lots of hobbies. Here are details of some them: _______________________________________ | | Horse riding, football, |Hobbies | swimming, collecting, | | roller skating, sports. |___________| _________________________ |Games with | Rounders, 40 40, toy cars |friends | long line, Jack Frost, | | chess, bulldog, it. |___________|__________________________ |Games at | Monopoly, snooker,cards, | home | swing ball, tack, tennis | | climbing trees. |___________|__________________________ |Games in | Poo sticks, armies, | the | follow the leader on | villages | bikes, spying, rounders, | | cowboys and indians, | | football.
